title: I Don't Like Company And He Knows It
itunes:title: I Don't Like Company And He Knows It
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been married for 7 years to a man that is wonderful in every way, except one. He doesn’t respect my time or my privacy. I knew him for many years prior to dating him and we would meet as friends for dinner and drinks when he was in-between relationships. He went from relationship to relationship before we started dating because he is the type of man that does not ever want to be alone............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
